name: True Friends
description:
You find yourself in strange dungeons full of puzzles, death traps... and friends!

Use your pals' special abilities to make your way out!

Find out who must be sacrificed in this point and click adventure

(puzzled together in 50 hours in the Pencil, Chisel, Code Jam)

Credits:

(Art) MysteryDragon13 - Student, Filmographer | DeviantArt

(Music and sound) https://ferguson-music.itch.io/brents-sound-museum 

(Level design and programming) https://thetrueduck.itch.io/

(Programming) https://golemstudios.itch.io/

(Programming) "Janaran"
